vb17:1.1: anavaññātamado → anavaññattimado (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); anavattaññimado (si); anavasaññātamado (mr)
vb17:1.2: cetaso ca līnattaṃ → cetaso līnattaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
vb17:23.1: unnati unnāmo → uṇṇati uṇṇāmo (sya-all, mr); uṇṇati uṇṇamo (pts-vp-pli1)
vb17:41.2: aṭhapanā → aṭṭhapanā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); āṭhapanā (si, mr)
vb17:74.1: makkhāyanā makkhāyitattaṃ → makkhiyanā makkhiyitattaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
vb17:109.2: visaṭā → visadā (si, mr) | āyūhanī → āyūhinī (mr) | santhavo → sandhavo (mr) | sineho → sneho (bj) | āsīsanā āsīsitattaṃ → āsiṃsanā āsiṃsitattaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
vb17:167.1: katame tayo kiñcanā → katamāni tīṇi kiñcanāni (?)
vb17:193.1: anaddā anaddāyanā anaddāyitattaṃ → anādā anādāyanā anādāyitattaṃ (sya-all)
vb17:231.1: kumbhīlabhayaṃ → ūmibhayaṃ kumbhilabhayaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); kumbhīḷabhayaṃ (?) (kumbha + īra + a + bhaya)
